data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Lagunes.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lagunes, Côte d‘Ivoire

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Lagunes, Côte d‘Ivoire to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Lagunes a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Lagunes, Côte d‘Ivoire to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, please remember the Bozo, Sorogoye people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lagunes with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Lagunes access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, please raise up prophets in Lagunes who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
